text: Giuseppe Ferrara (15 July 1932 - 25 June 2016) was an Italian movie director and screenwriter. He was known for directing The Moro Affair (1986). Ferrara died in Rome, Italy on 25 June 2016 from cardiac arrest after suffering from pneumonia, aged 83.Ãˆ morto Giuseppe Ferrara, regista dell'impegno civile ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:People from Florence
title: Giuseppe Ferrara
